item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Mezcal Mexican Restaurant

You'll find an extensive variety of dishes from different regions of Mexico, from the Tradional Mole, the Machaca and the Carnitas estilo Michoacan to the delectable flavor of fresh seafood prepared in authentic Mexican style, all this made with the care and expertise that distinguishes Mezcal Restaurante Mexicano. Plus, this restaurant claims to have "the best margaritas in the world" and I have heard the sangria can't be beat!

Specials: $5 House Margaritas and $2.50 Draft Beer, free Mexican Decaf coffee samples for those looking to wake up or sober up!

If you are only a "Maybe" for Happy Hour Type Events, please put this in your RSVP Comment.

HOST: Christine will host this happy hour, she can be reached if you have trouble finding the group at 203.901.7393. 

Parking:  Either on State Street at meters, Mechanic or Nash St for free.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for/call/text the event "host". We're also usually one of the largest groups at the bar on a Monday.
